name: Pattern Pop
description:
Pop as many balloons as you can before the time runs out! Completing patterns will extend your time!

Reload by returning to the middle of the arena.

Pattern Pop was designed as a simple shooter to help treat strabismus (lazy eye). When our doctor recommended it for my daughter, I decided to create a relatively simple game for her, since the other games we tried were either too violent or difficult to control for a 6 year old.

Supporting Extra Life

1/3 of all funds raised by Pattern Pop will go to support the Stollery children's hospital (where my daughter had her eye surgery).
